channel.title: Need a little portal help
channel.description: Okay, i'm trying to make my portal teleport me to my shops location i added the case to actionhandler added the object to objectmanager, and all that my problem is that well it works when your behind it or in the center of the portal and my portal is on the side of a wall, & Ive already tried changing the face of it to make it face the front it did not work. & before you say move it i'm not.

item.title: Need a little portal help
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

I Vain I:

Change the object offset and distance.

I would do this how?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a little portal help

my problem is that well it works when your behind it or in the center of the portal
and my portal is on the side of a wall, & Ive already tried changing the face of it to make it face the front it did not work. & before you say move it i’m not.
